metadata.title: CVE-2021-20316 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Symlink race error can allow metadata read and modify outside of the exported share.

notes.note: mdeslaur> per upstream, fixing this required a whole rewrite of the VFS layer and there is no reasonable way to fix this in older versions. Marking this CVE as ignored for older releases.

criterions.comment: samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
